you can see the street from the window .
it 's a great place to work .
output.sentences: He entered the office building and went to the directory to find the office he needed to visit.
He headed upstairs and found the sign for Loyalty, Fidelity, Broccoli.
He went inside and saw a group of chairs, one being upside down.
He looked out the window and down to the street and saw a tow truck.
